${modID}:Bonk.NAME: Bonk
${modID}:Bonk.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL The image behaved. It wasted like twenty minutes of my time.

${modID}:DevastatingStrikeOLD.NAME: Devastating Strike
${modID}:DevastatingStrikeOLD.DESCRIPTION: Startup - Add a *Blood *Surge to your draw and discard piles. Unplayable while a *Blood *Surge exists. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:DevastatingStrikeOLD.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Grave. Startup - Add a *Blood *Surge+ to your draw and discard piles. Unplayable while a *Blood *Surge exists. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have a Blood Surge in play.

${modID}:BloodSurge.NAME: Blood Surge
${modID}:BloodSurge.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable until you lose HP this turn. NL Gain !M! Strength and heal 1 HP for every time you lost HP this combat. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I haven't lost HP this turn.

${modID}:Rondelmancy.NAME: Rondelmancy
${modID}:Rondelmancy.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you would create *Shivs, create !M! more. If you do not have hand space to create *Shivs, play them instead.

${modID}:UpdateJammer.NAME: Update Jammer
${modID}:UpdateJammer.DESCRIPTION: Orbs continue their passive effects after being Evoked.

${modID}:CruelSun.NAME: Cruel Sun
${modID}:CruelSun.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL All your cards are played twice. NL You cannot exit your Stance this combat.
${modID}:CruelSun.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: All your cards are played twice. NL You cannot exit your Stance this combat.

${modID}:Toxicology.NAME: Toxicology
${modID}:Toxicology.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever you apply Poison while this is in your hand, apply !M! more.

${modID}:HyperPropellant.NAME: Hyper Propellant
${modID}:HyperPropellant.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus this turn. You cannot Channel more Orbs until next turn.

${modID}:LivingBlade.NAME: Living Blade
${modID}:LivingBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. Permanently increase the number of times this hits by X. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Mordhau.NAME: Mordhau
${modID}:Mordhau.DESCRIPTION: Until the end of this turn, whenever you play an Attack, apply 1 ${modID}:Fracture to all enemies.
${modID}:Mordhau.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Until the end of next turn, whenever you play an Attack, apply 1 ${modID}:Fracture to all enemies.

${modID}:Splatter.NAME: Splatter
${modID}:Splatter.DESCRIPTION: Discard 2 cards. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 6 Poison.
${modID}:Splatter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 6 Poison.

${modID}:StackTrace.NAME: Stack Trace
${modID}:StackTrace.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Orb slot. NL Add a *Void into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:StackTrace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Orb slot. NL Add a *Dazed into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:StormyPetrel.NAME: Stormy Petrel
${modID}:StormyPetrel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you are in ${modID}:Tension, enter Calm. If you are in Calm, enter ${modID}:Tension.

${modID}:Spinebuster.NAME: Spinebuster
${modID}:Spinebuster.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy has Vulnerable, apply !M! ${modID}:Fracture.

${modID}:Plunge.NAME: Plunge
${modID}:Plunge.DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 Poison. If the target already has Poison, apply !M! instead.

${modID}:SpiritWalk.NAME: Spirit Walk
${modID}:SpiritWalk.DESCRIPTION: If you are in Wrath, add a *Safety to your hand. If you are in Calm, add a *Smite to your hand. Exit your Stance.

${modID}:BatteringRam.NAME: Battering Ram
${modID}:BatteringRam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Whenever you attack an enemy this turn, deal !D! damage.

${modID}:Vanish.NAME: Vanish
${modID}:Vanish.DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 Poison for every card that was discarded this combat.
${modID}:Vanish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 Poison for every card that was discarded this combat +3.

${modID}:PublicVoid.NAME: Public Void
${modID}:PublicVoid.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a cost 0 card, trigger the passive ability of all Dark Orbs.

${modID}:FindThePieces.NAME: Find the Pieces
${modID}:FindThePieces.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain 2 Mantra for every card in your hand that was created this combat.

${modID}:HubbleWave.NAME: Hubble Wave
${modID}:HubbleWave.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 ${modID}:Starlight for every 2 cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Stargazer.NAME: Stargazer
${modID}:Stargazer.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 ${modID}:Starlight at the end of your turns.
${modID}:Stargazer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Channel 1 ${modID}:Starlight at the end of your turn.

${modID}:Backpedal.NAME: Backpedal
${modID}:Backpedal.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you lost HP this turn, gain !${modID}:block2! additional Block.

${modID}:DotExe.NAME: DOT EXE
${modID}:DotExe.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Channel 3 Lightning, Channel 3 Frost, Channel 2 Dark, or Channel 1 Plasma and 1 ${modID}:Starlight. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:DotExe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Channel 3 Lightning, Channel 3 Frost, Channel 2 Dark, or Channel 1 Plasma and 1 ${modID}:Starlight.

${modID}:Tachycardia.NAME: Tachycardia
${modID}:Tachycardia.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 ${modID}:Acrimony to all enemies when you discard. NL At the end of your turn, apply Poison to enemies equal to their ${modID}:Acrimony.

${modID}:Sadomasochism.NAME: Sadomasochism
${modID}:Sadomasochism.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card whenever you apply Poison.
${modID}:Sadomasochism.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Draw 1 card whenever you apply Poison.

${modID}:Caustics.NAME: Caustics
${modID}:Caustics.DESCRIPTION: Add 2 *Shivs into your hand. NL This turn, your *Shivs apply 1 ${modID}:Acrimony. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Caustics.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add 2 *Shivs into your hand. NL This turn, your *Shivs apply 1 ${modID}:Acrimony.

${modID}:AmbientDeath.NAME: Ambient Death
${modID}:AmbientDeath.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, for the rest of combat your Skills apply !M! Poison to all enemies.

${modID}:Ironhand.NAME: Ironhand
${modID}:Ironhand.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you lose HP while this card is in your hand, permanently increase it's damage by 1.

${modID}:BlazingVeins.NAME: Blazing Veins
${modID}:BlazingVeins.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If you Exhaust a card while this is in your hand, lose !M! HP and add a copy of that card to your discard.

${modID}:Foolhardy.NAME: Foolhardy
${modID}:Foolhardy.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL For every 10 Block you gain, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by !M!.
${modID}:Foolhardy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For every 10 Block you gain, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by !M!.

${modID}:Callous.NAME: Callous
${modID}:Callous.DESCRIPTION: Gain !D! Block. NL Affected by damage modifiers instead.

${modID}:BlastingBlade.NAME: Blasting Blade
${modID}:BlastingBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Take !M! damage. NL If this broke your Block, deal !D! damage again.

${modID}:ScorchedSteel.NAME: Scorched Steel
${modID}:ScorchedSteel.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 HP and draw 1 card for every Attack in your hand.
${modID}:ScorchedSteel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 HP and draw 1 card for every Attack in your hand +1.

${modID}:DamageVitals.NAME: Damage Vitals
${modID}:DamageVitals.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you attack this enemy this turn, heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DevastatingStrike.NAME: Devastating Strike
${modID}:DevastatingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Fracture, Weak, and Vulnerable. NL Enemy loses 3 Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BurningMontante.NAME: Burning Montante
${modID}:BurningMontante.DESCRIPTION: Attacks that cost [E] [E] or more cost 1 more and are played !M! extra time.
${modID}:BurningMontante.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Attacks that cost [E] [E] or more cost 1 more and are played !M! extra times.

${modID}:PrismaDisruption.NAME: Prisma Disruption
${modID}:PrismaDisruption.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL stslib:Soulbound. NL Cards played while NL this is in your hand NL become Unplayable.

${modID}:ShockAndAwe.NAME: Shock and Awe
${modID}:ShockAndAwe.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Channel Lightning, Channel a random Orb.
${modID}:ShockAndAwe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you Channel Lightning, Channel a random Orb.

${modID}:JetFuelMixture.NAME: Jet Fuel Mixture
${modID}:JetFuelMixture.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you play a Power, gain !M! additional stacks of all other buffs and debuffs.
${modID}:JetFuelMixture.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Power, gain !M! additional stacks of all other buffs and debuffs.

${modID}:Karambit.NAME: Karambit
${modID}:Karambit.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, deal !D! damage to random enemies for each unspent [E].

${modID}:RopeDart.NAME: Rope Dart
${modID}:RopeDart.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play a *Shiv, add this from the draw pile to your hand.

${modID}:SharpenedEdge.NAME: Sharpened Edge
${modID}:SharpenedEdge.DESCRIPTION: Draw 5 cards. NL Fill the rest of your hand with *Shivs. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SharpenedEdge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 5 cards. NL Fill the rest of your hand with *Shivs+. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:AlphaTesting.NAME: Alpha Testing
${modID}:AlphaTesting.DESCRIPTION: Trigger the passive abilities of your Orbs. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:AlphaTesting.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Trigger the passive abilities of your Orbs.

${modID}:VoluntarySuicide.NAME: Voluntary Suicide
${modID}:VoluntarySuicide.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Trigger the enemy's Poison.

${modID}:WaterCooling.NAME: Water Cooling
${modID}:WaterCooling.DESCRIPTION: The next X cost 0 cards you play are played an additional time.
${modID}:WaterCooling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next X+!M! cost 0 cards you play are played an additional time.

${modID}:SystemFailure.NAME: System Failure
${modID}:SystemFailure.DESCRIPTION: Evoke all your Orbs twice. NL Lose all but one of your Orb slots. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SystemFailure.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evoke all your Orbs three times. NL Lose all but one of your Orb slots. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Clairvoyance.NAME: Clairvoyance
${modID}:Clairvoyance.DESCRIPTION: If you are in ${modID}:Tension, add 1 *Miracle and 1 *Insight to your hand, otherwise enter ${modID}:Tension.
${modID}:Clairvoyance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you are in ${modID}:Tension, add 1 *Miracle+ and 1 *Insight+ to your hand, otherwise enter ${modID}:Tension.

${modID}:EmptySpirit.NAME: Empty Spirit
${modID}:EmptySpirit.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Mantra. NL Exit your Stance.

${modID}:SpinKick.NAME: Spin Kick
${modID}:SpinKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Add 2 *Ponders into your hand.

${modID}:Starshower.NAME: Starshower
${modID}:Starshower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies for every card in your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Starshower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies for every card in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Tenkan.NAME: Tenkan
${modID}:Tenkan.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Enter your previous Stance. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Tenkan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Enter your previous Stance.

${modID}:Traumaturgy.NAME: Traumaturgy
${modID}:Traumaturgy.DESCRIPTION: If you are not in a Stance, enter Tension.

${modID}:Zen.NAME: Zen
${modID}:Zen.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL You cannot play Attacks this turn. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Zen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E] [E]. NL You cannot play Attacks this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DynamoEngine.NAME: Dynamo Engine
${modID}:DynamoEngine.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card for every Power played this combat. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:DynamoEngine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card for every Power played this combat.

${modID}:OverdriveBooster.NAME: Overdrive Booster
${modID}:OverdriveBooster.DESCRIPTION: Double your MAXIMUM Orb Slots. Gain !M! Orb Slots.

${modID}:Carcinogen.NAME: Carcinogen
${modID}:Carcinogen.DESCRIPTION: Remove the enemy's Artifact. NL Enemy loses 2 Strength. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SonicBoom.NAME: Sonic Boom
${modID}:SonicBoom.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this is played twice in one turn, take an extra turn.

${modID}:TryCatch.NAME: Try Catch
${modID}:TryCatch.DESCRIPTION: Channel nothing. NL The next Orb you Channel is added to this.
${modID}:TryCatch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Channel nothing. NL The next Orb you Channel is added to this.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL The next Orb you Channel is added to this.

${modID}:DreamlandExpress.NAME: Dreamland Express
${modID}:DreamlandExpress.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Dreamland Express deals !M! more damage this turn. NL Add a copy to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:MagnesiumHammer.NAME: Magnesium Hammer
${modID}:MagnesiumHammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase this by your Strength this combat.

${modID}:MachPunch.NAME: Mach Punch
${modID}:MachPunch.DESCRIPTION: Plays when drawn. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card.

${modID}:ShoulderBash.NAME: Shoulder Bash
${modID}:ShoulderBash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy does not intend to attack, it loses !M! Strength.

${modID}:Obliterate.NAME: Obliterate
${modID}:Obliterate.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills, play this card again.
${modID}:Obliterate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If this kills, play this card again.

${modID}:CrossStrike.NAME: Cross Strike
${modID}:CrossStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Vulnerable, apply !M! Weak.

${modID}:ThreadOfFate.NAME: Thread of Fate
${modID}:ThreadOfFate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile. NL Scry your entire draw pile.

${modID}:HandOfGod.NAME: Godhand
${modID}:HandOfGod.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Permanently reduce this card's damage by 1 after combat.

${modID}:BloodHunting.NAME: Blood Hunting
${modID}:BloodHunting.DESCRIPTION: This enemy takes double damage for !M! turns. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SlamRam.NAME: Slam Ram
${modID}:SlamRam.DESCRIPTION: If this is the first card played this turn, play all Attacks in your hand. NL Gain !M! Weak, Vulnerable, and Frail. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:UndyingSpear.NAME: Undying Spear
${modID}:UndyingSpear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is Exhausted, raise your Max HP by !M!.

${modID}:GodOfWar.NAME: God of War
${modID}:GodOfWar.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E]  for each Attack played this combat. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, permanently double this card's damage. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Expedite.NAME: Expedite
${modID}:Expedite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have 3 or less cards in hand, draw !M! cards.

${modID}:Sidewinder.NAME: Sidewinder
${modID}:Sidewinder.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Swap your draw and discard pile.

${modID}:Undistort.NAME: Undistort
${modID}:Undistort.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your maximum hand size is 99. NL Draw !M! cards. Discard !M! cards.

${modID}:Database.NAME: Database
${modID}:Database.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! random Powers into your draw pile.

${modID}:StarCannon.NAME: Star Cannon
${modID}:StarCannon.DESCRIPTION: Channel 2 Starlight. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies for each channeled Starlight.

${modID}:DivineSmite.NAME: Divine Smite
${modID}:DivineSmite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you are in Wrath, deal !D! damage again and Exhaust.

${modID}:Justify.NAME: Justify
${modID}:Justify.DESCRIPTION: If you are in Divinity, reduce the cost of all cards in your hand to 0 this turn, otherwise gain !M! Mantra. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Nihilism.NAME: Nihilism
${modID}:Nihilism.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose a card in your hand to permanently remove from your deck.

${modID}:Heartbeat.NAME: Heartbeat
${modID}:Heartbeat.DESCRIPTION: The first time you play an Attack each turn, enter Calm.
${modID}:Heartbeat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL The first time you play an Attack each turn, enter Calm.

${modID}:DormantStrike.NAME: Dormant Strike
${modID}:DormantStrike.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When Retained, add a copy into your hand without this ability. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DormantStrikeCopy.NAME: Dormant Strike
${modID}:DormantStrikeCopy.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Firewatch.NAME: Firewatch
${modID}:Firewatch.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Vigor. NL Increase this by !${modID}:vigorIncrease! whenever you change Stances while this is in your hand.

${modID}:UnlockPotential.NAME: Unlock Potential
${modID}:UnlockPotential.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable unless you are in Divinity. NL Exit your Stance. NL Add a Relic to this combat's rewards.
${modID}:UnlockPotential.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Unplayable unless you are in Divinity. NL Exit your Stance. NL Add a Relic to this combat's rewards.

${modID}:FumeHood.NAME: Fume Hood
${modID}:FumeHood.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the enemy's Poison.

${modID}:Misdirection.NAME: Misdirection
${modID}:Misdirection.DESCRIPTION: Choose up to !M! card in your draw pile. NL Add it to your hand, then discard it.
${modID}:Misdirection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose up to !M! cards in your draw pile. NL Add them to your hand, then discard them.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: add to your hand and discard.

${modID}:EdgeAlignment.NAME: Edge Alignment
${modID}:EdgeAlignment.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard a Shiv, Exhaust it and Shivs deal !M! additional damage.

${modID}:IridiumToxins.NAME: Iridium Toxins
${modID}:IridiumToxins.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply Poison, increase applied Poison by !M! for the rest of combat.

${modID}:ElectricBaghnakhs.NAME: Electric Baghnakhs
${modID}:ElectricBaghnakhs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage of ALL cost 0 cards by !M! this combat.

${modID}:OverloadedCircuits.NAME: Overloaded Circuits
${modID}:OverloadedCircuits.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Double the number of times this hits for each Power in your hand.

${modID}:ReturnNull.NAME: Return Null
${modID}:ReturnNull.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a Void into your draw pile. NL Put !M! random cost 0 cards from your draw pile into your hand.
${modID}:ReturnNull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a Void into your discard pile. NL Put !M! random cost 0 cards from your draw pile into your hand.
